com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Class AbstractProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.AbstractProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DexMakerProxy, JdkDynamicProxy

    public abstract class AbstractProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler

    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework. Infinitum offers two implementations for JDK dynamic proxies and DexMaker proxies.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/13/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
    See Also:
    JdkDynamicProxy, DexMakerProxy
